name: Dan Panorama Eilat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from the most wonderful 9 night stay at this hotel. It was really difficult to find fault with anything.We had a lovely room overlooking the marina with flat screen tv and all the comforts that you would expect in a 5 star hotel ( this hotel is officially rated 4 star). Breakfast was excellent with huge choice from the buffet.Nice large heated pool - with on duty lifeguard.
reviews.title: More 5 star than 4 star

reviews.text: Staff were very friendly and helpful. The barman was expert at making my wife her favourite cocktail every evening - a"lemon drop". And finally a big thank you to Keren the guest relations manager for being so helpful especially with restaurants and shopping tips.
reviews.title: Fabulous, simply fabulous 9 night stay.

reviews.text: We had a great time
reviews.title: Fantastic Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We drove down to Eilat from Tel Aviv on Christmas day, looking to have some fun and relaxation in the sun. We searched the internet as we are a family of 2 adults and 2 children who like our space, home comforts and had a reasonable budget.
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.text: First off I have to thank the Dan Panorama Eilat front desk, and especially BRIT, she was fabulous, she and her team looked after us amazingly, and made our holiday brilliant advising us, giving us ideas and sorting out a brilliant birthday surprise in our room for me (they filled the room with balloons and had a fruit platter and birthday cake awaiting us on our return from a Desert Jeep Tour).
reviews.title: Ok stay at the Dan Panorama
Great service, but the facility is not 5 stars.
reviews.text: Me and my wife just spet 3 nights.
Positive:
reviews.title: Very good Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is nice and clean.
reviews.title: The best hotel in Eilat

reviews.text: The room is spacious.
reviews.title: Fine hotel, but nothing special

reviews.text: The service is fantastic in all departments. You get the feeling you are very welcome all the time!
reviews.title: Avoid for business travel - this is an okay family holiday hotel at best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed for two separate nights at the Dan Panorama Hotel Eilat going to and from our tour in Jordan. The hotel itself is nice although a little "worn out". The rooms were spacious and comfortable, and we stayed on the Executive Floor which provided access to the Executive Lounge which I highly recommend to pay a little extra for this privilege.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: We ate downstairs in the snack bar area one night and the food was adequate. I would suggest exploring other restaurant options in Eilat if you are looking for a good dinner.
reviews.title: Comfortable getawsy
Excellent Staff
reviews.text: I would recommend this hotel to both business and leisure travelers, but make sure that you consider paying more to get access to the Executive Lounge. It is well worth the extra expense!!!

We spent 3 nights for a convention in eilat. The hotel is a great value, rooms with a view to the marina, very clean, bed was great and comfortable. Breakfast an dinner buffet were great with a large selection and great quality. Overall great value, Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Pefrect hotel it Eilat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My family of 6 stayed for 4 nights in December and had a very positive experience. We had connecting rooms (one of which was a terrace room with hot tub -- terraces were HUGE with nice view of the mountains.) The rooms were very nicely appointed and suited us perfectly. We also had access to the executive lounge with excellent snacks and service. The front desk staff was extremely accommodating. Stav (one of the managers) was particularly helpful with any and all issues. Would definitely stay again!
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: We had a wonderful view of the harbor from the balconies in each of our two rooms. We stayed for two nights. The rooms were clean and spacious. We were greeted by a wonderful concierge on our arrival. We were given helpful information about things to do, places to eat. There were a few perks such as an invitation to an afternoon spread of cakes,fruit, juices and wine in the front lobby to welcome the Shabbat as well as a honey cake in our room. We were given a package of dead sea products in our room as well as to enjoy an afternoon coffee and dessert during a n afternoon. Breakfast was bountiful with so many choices! The pool and exercise room were very relaxing. There was even a production of "Mama Mia" in Hebrew put on one evening in one of the large conference rooms with a stage When we return to Eilat, we will stay here once again .
reviews.title: Great place to stay in Eilat

reviews.text: The majority of reviews rate this hotel as Excellent. I chose to rate it very good because while it is comfortable and conveniently located, it is not located on the beach / boardwalk, which might be a disappointment for some. Additionally, some of the other larger hotels had fancier lobbies and I assume more luxurious rooms (Of course this will come at a higher price).
reviews.title: Comfortable Hotel in a Good Location

reviews.text: The good news is that the hotel is a 5 minute walk to the beach and the boardwalk, which offers good shopping and restaurants (many with outdoor eating areas that border the beach and offer great views).
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in a prime location and great rooms!

reviews.text: The Dan Panorama is a comfortable hotel. The breakfast includes a large selection and offers freshly made doughnuts, which we did not get at the other three Dan hotels we stayed in while visiting Israel.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel.

reviews.text: The rooms were reasonably spacious and offered balconies. The views on one side overlooked the lagoon, while the other side offered views of the airport and city with the mountains behind it.
reviews.title: Panorama means no way

description: Ideally located for a vacation that blends sun and fun with Eilat's spectacular natural attractions. The hotel overlooks Eilat's lovely lagoon, just a few minutes walk from the relaxing North Beach, where the clear waters of the Red Sea lap the sunny shores perfect for sunbathing, swimming, snorkeling and a variety of water sports. Eilat’s climate is ideal for sun lovers, as it is warm and sunny all year round.
